title: Luxury 3 Bedroom Penthouse for Sale in Rajagiriya
details:
REF NO: AFS0194

Luxury 3 Bedroom Penthouse for Sale in Rajagiriya

Brand new 3 Bedroom Penthouse approx. 2000 Sq.ft (one of only 2) at The Highness Rajagiriya.

The Penthouse has spacious and light filled living and dining areas overlooking a large terrace with a spectacular harbour view.

The 3 large bedrooms have attached toilets and a separate powder room.

There is a separate domestics room and bathroom, and the apartment comes with 2 parking slots.

The Highness is a well designed, stylish luxury condominium developed by Homelands Skyline with 4 floors of parking, and 8 floors in total. The roof top on the 8th floor consists of 2 penthouses, pool area, fully equipped gym, and a Club house.

Located on Rajagiriya road 500m from Cotta rd, 500m to Keells super, and very close to numerous restaurants (Italian, Chinese, Japanese, Korean, Mc Donalds, KFC etc.) and department stores (Shades, Beverly Street).

Close to leading International schools - British School, CIS
as well as leading local schools.

Price of the property - LKR 65 Million
Price is exclusive of legal fee and stamp duty fee
